5/? 64 years later, Ike's NSC process, criticized at the time and later by Kennedy, is viewed as an ideal model for grand strategic planning
4/? The Solarium process generated consensus around Ike's alternative strategy that rejected Truman's NSC 68 and ‚Äúrollback‚Äù of USSR
3/? Solarium commissioned 3 teams (each w/ 7 of the leading thinkers of the day) to develop alternative strategies for confronting USSR
2/? NSC 162/2, the New Look, was the product of Ike's competitive review of grand strategy, known as Project Solarium
